remarks: The quotient rule for everywhere-differentiable functions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvdivf.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvdivf.f $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> CC ) $.
dvdivf.g $e |- ( ph -> G : X --> ( CC \ { 0 } ) ) $.
dvdivf.fdv $e |- ( ph -> dom ( S _D F ) = X ) $.
dvdivf.gdv $e |- ( ph -> dom ( S _D G ) = X ) $.
dvdivf $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( F oF / G ) ) = ( ( ( ( S _D F ) oF x. G ) oF - ( ( S _D G ) oF x. F ) ) oF / ( G oF x. G ) ) ) $.
